edu.cmu.ri.rcommerce.particleFilter
Interface Measurer<P extends Particle>

All Known Implementing Classes:
MapConstrainedRSSIMeasurer2D, MapConstrainMeasurer, NullMeasurer, RSSIMeasurer
public interface Measurer<P extends Particle>

Given a list of particles, updates the likelihood weights of each of them based on new information

Method Summary
 boolean shouldResample()
          After updateWeights has been run, this indicates whether a resample step should be run
 List<P> updateWeights(List<P> updatedState)
          Update likelihood weights.
 

Method Detail

updateWeights

List<P> updateWeights(List<P> updatedState)
Update likelihood weights. The weights don't have to be normalized.

Parameters:
updatedState - The current list of particles. The contents of the list may be modified by updateWeights.
Returns:
A list of particles with updated weights. May be the same object as the input (or a different one)

shouldResample

boolean shouldResample()
After updateWeights has been run, this indicates whether a resample step should be run

Returns:
boolean indicating whether a resample step is recommended
